domain.description: A section of a government, like The Supreme Court

entity.name: COVID-19: Latest news updates from around the world
entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19

text: @SkyNewsBreak Unbelievable number of deaths in the U.K. & more will die, as the #coronavirus is deadly but also this govt failing to protect people. They got a lot of things wrong, they delayed in acting quickly. Not enough PPE, not enough Tests, not enough equipment for @NHSuk! #StayHome
